regexCodeList.string: You are too full to eat more.$

Trigger.name: number
Trigger.script: bot.status.inventory.numItems = tonumber(matches[2]) bot.status.inventory.maxItems = tonumber(matches[3]) disableTrigger("refresh inventory") raiseEvent("inventoryUpdated")

regexCodeList.string: ^You drink the last drops of water from a (.*) you are carrying.$
(.+) you are carrying is already empty.$

Trigger.name: notInInventory
Trigger.script: -- The mud will replace the '.'s between words in the command we sent -- with ' '. Change them back so we can tell if we couldn't find the -- item we asked for. raiseEvent("notInInventory", string.gsub(matches[2], " ", "%."))

regexCodeList.string: You aren't carrying any items matching "(.+)"\.$
[Also try the command identity for more information.]

Trigger.name: Prompt
Trigger.script:
bot.status.health.hits = tonumber(matches[2]) bot.status.health.maxHits = tonumber(matches[3]) bot.status.health.energy = tonumber(matches[4]) bot.status.health.maxEnergy = tonumber(matches[5]) bot.status.health.moves = tonumber(matches[6]) bot.status.health.maxMoves = tonumber(matches[7]) bot.status.score.xp = tonumber(matches[8]) bot.status.location.exits=string.lower(matches[11]) raiseEvent("prompt")
-- prompt ?p'-- MORE -- '<%f?f|%h/%Hhp %e/%Ee ?m'[%m/%Mmv]'!m'%v/%Vmv' %xxp ?b'%c'!b'%d'>

Trigger.name: init
someoneFled
Trigger.script: -- TODO: This could also be a player fleeing. The trigger should differentiate raiseEvent("someoneFled", string.lower(string.trim(matches[2])), string.lower(string.trim(matches[3])))

Trigger.name: someoneIsDEAD
Trigger.script: -- TODO: This may detect a player's death as well as an npc. raiseEvent("someoneIsDEAD", string.lower(string.trim(matches[2])))

regexCodeList.string: What typo do you wish to report?

Trigger.name: equipment line
Trigger.script: if not (matches[1] == "---- --------") then if #matches == 5 then bot.status.equipment.currentEqLayer = matches[2] bot.status.equipment.items[#bot.status.equipment.items + 1] = {matches[2], matches[3], matches[4], matches[5]} elseif #matches == 4 then bot.status.equipment.items[#bot.status.equipment.items + 1] = {bot.items.currentEqLayer, matches[2], matches[3], matches[4]} end end

Trigger.name: disable equipment
Trigger.script: bot.status.inventory.wornWeight = tonumber(matches[2]) disableTrigger("equipment line") disableTrigger("refresh equipment") raiseEvent("equipmentUpdated")

regexCodeList.string: ^ (\[Here\]| north| east| south| west| up| down) : (.+)$

Script.name: Spam
Script.script: ------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- function spam (command, n) for i = 1, n do send(command) end end
